ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Relics and Artifacts
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, Sarg Bjornson, legodude17
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds another 40 'useless' relic items like Chalice, Ark or Shard in Ideology DLC. You can now find Shards of a Sword, mechanoid head, Mysterious orb and many, many more. Furthermore, this mod unlocks all the apparel in the game from being unable to spawn as relics, which means your colonists might now find holy power armor helmets or sacred boots. This should greatly enhance ideologies generated by the game.
